# TweakNow PowerPack 4.6.0: A Suite of Utilities to Fine-Tune Your PC
 
TweakNow PowerPack 4.6.0 is a fully-integrated suite of utilities that lets you fine-tune every aspect of your computer's operating system and Web browser. Whether you want to optimize your system performance, customize your Windows appearance, or tweak your Internet settings, TweakNow PowerPack 4.6.0 has the tools you need.
 
Some of the features of TweakNow PowerPack 4.6.0 are:

- The Registry Cleaner module provides you with a safe and simple way to clean Windows Registry. It can scan for obsolete or incorrect entries and fix them automatically.
- The Virtual Desktop module lets you create up to four virtual desktops and switch between them with a hotkey. This can help you organize your work and reduce clutter on your screen.
- The RAM Idle program manages the free memory that is available to run Windows programs. It can prevent performance from degrading as you swap files and programs in and out of memory.
- The AutoShutdown program lets you schedule your computer to shut down, restart, or log off at a specified time. You can also set it to perform a task before shutting down, such as cleaning up your hard drive or running a backup program.
- The CD AutoRun module lets you control the behavior of your CD-ROM drive when a CD is inserted. You can enable or disable the autorun feature, or customize it for different types of CDs.
